attributes.action: Make homework less of a stress for kids in schools
attributes.background: Stop giving kids so much homework as it causes quite a lot of stress to hand it in on time

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ban schools from setting more than four hours of homework a week: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618953

Ban schools from being able to set homework: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622990
